alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 9:29PM EDT until April 10 at 5:24AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky... Ohio River at Shawneetown .Minor flooding will soon come to an end on the Ohio River at Shawneetown. The river will fall below flood stage early Monday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly bottomland and surrounding low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 33.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 17.6 feet Wednesday, April 19. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
